<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 5.75pt;text-indent:-5.75pt;"><b><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Nexen 
Inc.</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 5.75pt;text-indent:-5.75pt;"><b><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Notes to 
Unaudited Condensed Consolidated Financial Statements</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 5.75pt;text-indent:-5.75pt;"><i><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
style:italic;">Cdn$&nbsp;millions, except as noted</font></i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 5.75pt;text-indent:-5.75pt;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 23.75pt;text-indent:-23.75pt;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">1.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><font
size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">BASIS OF 
PRESENTATION</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 23.75pt;text-indent:-23.75pt;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Nexen Inc. (Nexen, we or our) is an independent, 
global energy company with operations in the UK North Sea, US Gulf of Mexico, 
offshore Nigeria, Canada, Yemen, Colombia and Poland. Nexen is incorporated and 
domiciled in Canada and our head office is located at 801&#151;7</font><font 
size="1" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">th</font><font 
size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;Avenue SW, Calgary, Alberta, Canada. 
Nexen&#146;s shares are publicly traded on both the Toronto Stock Exchange and 
the New York Stock Exchange.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">These Unaudited Condensed Consolidated Financial 
Statements for the three and six months ended June&nbsp;30, 2012 have been 
prepared in accordance with International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS) 
as issued by the International Accounting Standards Board (IASB). Specifically, 
they have been prepared in accordance with International Accounting Standard 
(IAS) 34 <i>Interim Financial Reporting</i>. The Unaudited Condensed 
Consolidated Financial Statements do not include all of the information required
for annual financial statements and should be read in conjunction with the 
Audited Consolidated Financial Statements for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 
2011, which have been prepared in accordance with IFRS.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Unaudited Condensed Consolidated Financial 
Statements were authorized for issue by Nexen&#146;s Board of Directors on 
July&nbsp;18, 2012.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 23.75pt;text-indent:-23.75pt;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">2.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><font
size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ACCOUNTING 
POLICIES</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 23.75pt;text-indent:-23.75pt;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">The accounting policies we follow are described in 
Note 2 of the Audited Consolidated Financial Statements for the year ended 
December&nbsp;31, 2011. There have been no changes to our accounting policies 
since December&nbsp;31, 2011.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">18<a 
name="PB_18_024524_455"></a></font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; PROPERTY, PLANT AND 
EQUIPMENT (PP&amp;E)</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Carrying amount of 
PP&amp;E</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-
collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
<tr>
<td width="36%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:36.5%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>    </td>
<td width="10%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid 
windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.0%;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">Exploration</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-
size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;"><br>    </font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-
size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">and</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-
size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;"><br>    </font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-
size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Evaluation</font></b></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>    </td>
<td width="10%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid 
windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.0%;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-

face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2,347</font></p>    </td>

style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.0%;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade 
color="black" align="left"></div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.1pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">1&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">Includes PP&amp;E costs related to our Usan development, offshore 
Nigeria which came on-stream February&nbsp;2012.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exploration and evaluation assets mainly comprise of 
unproved properties and capitalized exploration drilling costs. Assets under 
construction at June&nbsp;30, 2012 primarily include our developments in the UK 
North Sea.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; LONG-TERM 
DEBT</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">During the three and six months ended June&nbsp;30, 
2012, we borrowed and repaid nil and $254 million on our term credit facilities,
respectively. We recorded $85 million and $10 million, respectively, of
unrealized foreign exchange losses on long-term debt in other comprehensive 
income.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">We have undrawn, committed, unsecured term credit 
facilities of $3.8 billion, of which $700 million is available until 2014 and 
$3.1 billion is available until 2017. As at June&nbsp;30, 2012, $232 million of 
our term credit facilities were utilized to support letters of credit 
(December&nbsp;31, 2011&#151;$367 million).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Nexen has undrawn, uncommitted, unsecured credit 
facilities of approximately $180 million. We utilized $21 million of these 
facilities to support outstanding letters of credit at June&nbsp;30, 2012 
(December&nbsp;31, 2011&#151;$17 million).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Nexen has uncommitted, unsecured credit facilities of 
approximately $214 million exclusively to support letters of credit. We utilized
$3 million of these facilities</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">  
</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">to support outstanding letters 
of credit at June&nbsp;30, 2012 (December&nbsp;31, 2011&#151;$4 
million).</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19<a 
name="PB_19_024524_4141"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>

</table>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Capitalized interest relates to and is included as 
part of the cost of our oil and gas properties. The capitalization rates are 
based on our weighted-average cost of borrowings.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">6.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; EQUITY</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">(a)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#
160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><font 
size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Common Shares</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Authorized share capital consists of an unlimited 
number of common shares of no par value. At June&nbsp;30, 2012, there were 
529,335,905 common shares outstanding (December&nbsp;31, 2011&#151;527,892,635 
common shares).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">(b)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#
160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><font 
size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Preferred 
Shares</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Authorized share capital consists of an unlimited 
number of Class&nbsp;A preferred shares of no par value, issuable in series. At 
June&nbsp;30, 2012, there were 8,000,000 Cumulative Redeemable Class&nbsp;A Rate
Reset Preferred Shares, Series&nbsp;2 outstanding (December&nbsp;31, 
2011&#151;nil).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">(c)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#
160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><font 
size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Earnings Per Common Share 
(EPS)</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">We calculate basic EPS using net income attributable 
to Nexen Inc. shareholders, adjusted for preferred share dividends and divided 
by the weighted-average number of common shares outstanding. We calculate 
diluted EPS in the same manner as basic, except we adjust basic earnings for the
potential conversion of the subordinated debentures and potential exercise of 
outstanding tandem options for shares, if dilutive. We use the weighted-average 
number of diluted common shares outstanding in the denominator of our diluted 
EPS calculation.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='20',FILE='C:\JMS\105568\12-15894-1\task5438768\15894-1-mm-
09.htm',USER='105568',CD='Jul 19 02:45 2012' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">In calculating the weighted-average number of diluted 
common shares outstanding and related earnings adjustments for the three and six
months ended June&nbsp;30, 2012, we excluded 14,910,152 and 14,879,437 tandem 
options, respectively (2011&#151;15,068,347 and 15,210,923, respectively) 
because their exercise price was greater than the average common share market 
price in the quarter. During the three months ended June&nbsp;30, 2012, the 
potential conversion of tandem options was the only dilutive instrument. During 
the six months ended June&nbsp;30, 2012, and the three and six months ended 
June&nbsp;30, 2011, the potential conversion of tandem options and subordinated 
debentures were the only dilutive instruments.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">(d)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#
160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><font 
size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Dividends</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">We paid dividends of $0.05 and $0.10 per common share,
for the three and six months ended June&nbsp;30, 2012 ($0.05 and $0.10 per 
common share for the respective periods ended June&nbsp;30, 2011). Dividends 
paid to holders of common shares have been designated as &#147;eligible 
dividends&#148; for Canadian tax purposes.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">On July&nbsp;18, 2012, the board of directors declared
a quarterly dividend of $0.05 per common share, payable October&nbsp;1, 2012 to 
the shareholders of record on September&nbsp;10, 2012. Also, the board of 
directors declared a quarterly dividend of $0.3125 per preferred share, payable 
September&nbsp;30, 2012 to the shareholders of record on September&nbsp;10, 
2012.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">7.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; COMMITMENTS, CONTINGENCIES 
AND GUARANTEES</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">As described in Note 19 to the 2011 Audited 
Consolidated Financial Statements, there are a number of lawsuits and claims 
pending, the ultimate results of which cannot be ascertained at this time. We 
record costs as they are incurred or become determinable. We believe that 
payments, if any, related to existing indemnities would not have a material
adverse effect on our liquidity, financial condition or results of 
operations.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">We assume various contractual obligations and 
commitments in the normal course of our operations. During the quarter, we 
entered into drilling rig commitments in the UK North Sea.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">

<td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF"

<td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF"

included in Note 19 to the 2011 Audited Consolidated Financial Statements and

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='22',FILE='C:\JMS\105568\12-15894-1\task5438768\15894-1-mm-
11.htm',USER='105568',CD='Jul 19 02:47 2012' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">10.&#160;&#160;&#160; 
DISPOSITIONS</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Asset Dispositions</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Canadian Undeveloped Leases</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">During the quarter, we sold non-core leases in Canada 
for proceeds of $46 million and recognized a gain of $45 million.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">11.&#160;&#160;&#160; OPERATING 
SEGMENTS AND RELATED INFORMATION</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Nexen has the following operating segments:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Conventional Oil and 
Gas:</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> We explore for, develop
and produce crude oil and natural gas from conventional sources around the 
world. Our operations are focused in the UK North Sea, North America (Canada and
US) and other countries (offshore Nigeria, Colombia, Yemen and 
Poland).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Oil Sands</font></b><font size="2" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">: We develop and produce synthetic crude oil from the 
Athabasca oil sands in northern Alberta. We produce bitumen using in situ and 
mining technologies and upgrade it into synthetic crude oil before ultimate 
sale. Our in situ activities are comprised of our operations at Long Lake and 
future development phases. Our mining activities are conducted through our 7.23%
ownership of the Syncrude Joint Venture.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Shale Gas:</font></b><font size="2" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;"> We explore for and produce unconventional gas from 
shale formations in northeast British Columbia. Production and results of 
operations are included within Conventional Oil and Gas until they become 
significant.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Corporate and Other includes energy marketing and 
unallocated items. The results of Canexus have been presented as discontinued 
operations.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">The accounting policies of our operating segments are 
the same as those described in Note 2 of our Audited Consolidated Financial 
Statements for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2011. Net income (loss) of our 
operating segments excludes interest income, interest expense, income tax 
expense, unallocated corporate expenses and foreign exchange gains and losses. 
Identifiable assets are those used in the operations of the segments.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">23<a 
name="PB_23_024628_8715"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>

style="font-size:6.5pt;font-weight:bold;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">4</font></b></p>    </td>
<td width="8%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 
2.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:8.0%;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">127</font></b></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>    </td>
<td width="8%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 
2.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:8.0%;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">62</font></b></p>    </td>
<td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>    </td>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-

<td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF"

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">743</font></b></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" 
style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>    </td>   </tr>
</table>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade 
color="black" align="left"></div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.1pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">1&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">Includes results of operations in Nigeria, Yemen and 
Colombia.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.1pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">2</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Includes exploration activities primarily in Colombia 
and Poland, and recovery of previously expensed exploration costs in 
Norway.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.1pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">3</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Includes UK current tax expense of $380 
million.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.1pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">4</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Includes capital expenditures in Nigeria of $91 
million.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 9.0pt;text-indent:-9.0pt;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Segmented net income for the three 
months ended June&nbsp;30, 2011</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

color="black" align="left"></div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.1pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">1&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">Includes results of operations in Yemen and Colombia.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.1pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">2&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">Includes Yemen Masila net sales of $169 million and net income 
before taxes of $78 million.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.1pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">3&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">Includes exploration activities primarily in Norway, Colombia and 
Poland.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.1pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">4&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">Includes UK current tax expense of $323 million.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.1pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">5&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">Includes capital expenditures in Nigeria of $114 
million.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">24<a 
name="PB_24_024628_563"></a></font></p>

color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade 
color="black" align="left"></div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.1pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">1&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">Includes results of operations in Nigeria, Yemen and 
Colombia.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.1pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">2</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Includes exploration activities primarily in Colombia 
and Poland, and recovery of previously expensed exploration costs in 
Norway.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.1pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">3</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Includes UK current tax expense of $856 
million.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.1pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">4</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Includes capital expenditures in Nigeria of $187 
million.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 9.0pt;text-indent:-9.0pt;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Segmented net income for the six 
months ended June&nbsp;30, 2011</font></b></p>

style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.1pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">1&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">Includes results of operations in Yemen and Colombia.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.1pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">2&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">Includes Yemen Masila net sales of $315 million and net income 
before taxes of $135 million.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.1pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">3&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">Includes exploration activities primarily in Norway, Colombia and 
Poland.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.1pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">4&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">Includes UK current tax expense of $749 million.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.1pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">5&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">Includes capital expenditures in Nigeria of $214 
million.</font></p>

color="black" align="left"></div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.1pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">1&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">Includes cash of $667 million, and Energy Marketing accounts 
receivable, current derivative assets and inventory of $935 million.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.1pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">2&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">Includes net book value of $1,495 million associated with our 
Canadian shale gas operations.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.1pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">3&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">Includes net book value of $1,896 million related to our Usan 
development, offshore Nigeria.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.1pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">4&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">Includes net book value of $5,162 million for Long Lake Phase 1 
and $728 million for future phases of our in situ oil sands projects.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 5.5pt;text-indent:-5.5pt;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Segmented assets as at 
December&nbsp;31, 2011</font></b></p>

style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

development, offshore Nigeria.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.1pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="1" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-
3.0pt;">4&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">Includes net book value of $5,050 million for Long Lake Phase 1 
and $660 million for future phases of our in situ oil sands projects.</font></p>
